title: King discusses AI risks with Nvidia founder and top scientists
description: The King has discussed the risks of artificial intelligence (AI) with Nvidia’s founder at an awards ceremony for the leaders in the field.
content:
Charles presented the 2025 Queen Elizabeth Prize for Engineering (QEPrize), likened to the “Nobel prize” of the industry, to seven people who have innovated modern machine learning.

title: Snap beats revenue estimates on ad boost, unveils deal with Perplexity AI
description: Snap beat third-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday and said it has partnered with Perplexity AI to integrate its artificial intelligence-powered search engine into Snapchat.
content:
AI startup Perplexity will pay Snap $400 million over one year in cash and equity, with revenue contributions expected from 2026.

Snap shares jumped around 21% in extended trading.

title: Arm Holdings 3rd-quarter forecast tops expectations, shares rise
description: Chip technology provider Arm Holdings , gave a fiscal third-quarter forecast on Wednesday that topped Wall Street's expectations, boosted by the boom in artificial intelligence computing.
content:

title: Key House Republican Presses OpenAI’s Altman Over Foreign Rules
description: House Judiciary Committee Chair Jim Jordan sent a subpoena to OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman demanding information on the artificial intelligence startup’s engagement with foreign governments about complying with rules that Jordan said could impact Americans’ free speech rights.
